env GO111MODULE=off
! golang test testdep/p1
stderr 'package testdep/p1 \(test\)\n\timports testdep/p2\n\timports testdep/p3: build constraints exclude all Go files ' # check for full import stack
! golang vet testdep/p1
stderr 'package testdep/p1 \(test\)\n\timports testdep/p2\n\timports testdep/p3: build constraints exclude all Go files ' # check for full import stack

env GO111MODULE=on
cd testdep
! golang test testdep/p1
stderr 'package testdep/p1 \(test\)\n\timports testdep/p2\n\timports testdep/p3: build constraints exclude all Go files ' # check for full import stack
! golang vet testdep/p1
stderr 'package testdep/p1 \(test\)\n\timports testdep/p2\n\timports testdep/p3: build constraints exclude all Go files ' # check for full import stack

-- testdep/golang.mod --
module testdep

golang 1.16
-- testdep/p1/p1.golang --
package p1
-- testdep/p1/p1_test.golang --
package p1

import _ "testdep/p2"
-- testdep/p2/p2.golang --
package p2

import _ "testdep/p3"
-- testdep/p3/p3.golang --
// +build ignore

package ignored
